search_results.title: Daniel Brook – Keynote Speaker
search_results.snippet: Daniel Brook is the acclaimed author of books on urban history including A History of Future Cities, The Accident of Color, and The Einstein of Sex.

search_results.title: Andrew Brook
search_results.snippet: Andrew Brook (born 17 March 1943) is a Canadian philosopher, author and academic particularly known for his writings on Immanuel Kant

search_results.title: Brook M Thompson: HOME
search_results.snippet: Brook is a Yurok and Karuk Native American from Northern California. Brook's goal is to bring together water rights and Indigenous knowledge.
